table_description: Contains data for the fastest laps recorded in races from 1950-2020, including driver and team details.
use_cases: Fastest laps by driver or team
data_quality_notes: driver_tag column name differs from race_results and race_wins which use name_tag
lap_time is TEXT - cannot do direct numeric comparisons without parsing
lap_time format varies across eras (e.g., '1:23.456' or '1:23.4')

table_columns.name: driver_tag
table_columns.description: Abbreviated tag of the driver's name. Note: Other tables use 'name_tag' for the same concept.

table_columns.name: lap_time
table_columns.description: Fastest lap time recorded as text (e.g., '1:23.456').
